message.content:
1. EPA, DHA, ARA and linoleic acid were measured.
2. These substances were measured in plasma phosphatidylcholine (PC).
3. These substances were also measured in erythrocytes.
4. The measurements were taken at several time points.
5. The measurements were taken up to the end of infusion.
6. The measurements were also taken 5 to 12 days after stopping the infusion.
7. The mean time for measurements after stopping the infusion was 9 days.

messages.content:
Statement: EPA, DHA, ARA and linoleic acid were measured in plasma phosphatidylcholine (PC) and erythrocytes at several times points up to the end of infusion and 5 to 12 days (mean 9 days) after stopping the infusion.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
